title: Information about an event
context: Ask a theater employee about the seating or venue rules.

content.bestLine: What's the seating arrangement like for this show?

neutral.text: Can I get some information about the venue?
What are the rules for this event?
Is there a specific seating chart?
Can you tell me about the theater's layout?

dialogs.description: Asking about seating at the box office

lines.speaker: Customer
lines.text: Hi, I'm looking for information about the seating for tonight's show.

lines.speaker: Box Office Employee
lines.text: Absolutely, let me show you the seating chart.

dialogs.description: Asking about venue rules from an usher

lines.speaker: Theatergoer
lines.text: Excuse me, are there any rules I should know about before the show starts?

lines.speaker: Usher
lines.text: Yes, please turn off your phone and refrain from taking pictures during the performance.
